question:
You recently bought a piece of equipment for your kitchen but it did not work. You phone the shop but no action was taken. 


Write a letter to the shop manager. In your letter
- describe the problem with the equipment
explain what happened when you phoned the shop
say what you would like the manager to do.
text: I am writing this letter to complain about the after-sale services in the company, after purchasing a microwave yesterday night. Let me introduce myself, my name is Zein Al Chami, and I am a frequent customer at the branch.

As a matter of fact, last night I shopped for a few small items for my house, including the defective microwave. Although I searched for the best brand in its category which is Sharp, as described by the salesman, it did not work at all.

I contacted the customer service in order to report the malfunction, yet to change it to a new one. Unfortunately, the team refused to displace the non-working item with another one, even if there is a year warranty.

I am asking politely to provide an alternative brand new working microwave or to pay the money back, therefore, I can get a novel micro-oven from this shop. Whereas, it would be better if the delivery service takes the bought one from my home.
Your prompt action will be highly appreciated,
